description: The Magnolia Betty is a bright, stunning and dazzling gift, perfect to lighten up any garden in the Spring. This deciduous tree is of a creative nature the Magnolia Betty prefers to grow upright rather than out wide providing a more unusual silhouette. Magnolia Betty is a great gift for any woman in your life and especially a ‘Betty’ for whatever occasion you choose birthday, anniversary or even housewarming Betty is sure to bring warmth to any home. Magnolia Betty is from the “little girl” hybrid collection of Magnolia and is probably the most vigorous of them all, much like any Betty you may know! The Magnolia Betty will prefer partial sun and shade and will require plenty of water in the first couple of years, like most women Magnolia Betty will want to be treated well, and so plant in a fairly well-protected area away from any harsh winds. Magnolia Betty will bloom early around mid-April and should still be sporting blooms by late September. Magnolia Betty is great for a small to medium-sized garden, the blooms are deep pink and purple on a dark waxy green leaf. The Magnolia Betty may rebloom every year and produce more flowers as it does - it really is a gift the just keeps on giving. * The Magnolia Betty is native to Japan. * The Magnolia Betty will arrive in a 10L pot. * The Magnolia Betty will be 90-120 cm tall (approx.) on arrival. * The Magnolia prefer to be in a protected area, as they can be subject to some damage by freezing weather. * The Magnolia Betty will love a good layer of mulch around the roots.

The Magnolia Betty may rebloom every year and produce more flowers as it does - it really is a gift the just keeps on giving. * The Magnolia Betty is native to Japan. * The Magnolia Betty will arrive in a 3L pot. * The Magnolia Betty will be 30-50 cm tall (approx.) on arrival. * The Magnolia prefer to be in a protected area, as they can be subject to some damage by freezing weather. * The Magnolia Betty will love a good layer of mulch around the roots.

At Peace Rose Bush Gift - The Perfect Memorial - Plant In Memory Of Someone Special - Gone but not forgotten

description: The At Peace Rose Gift is a personal gift of remembrance. The simplistic beauty of this rose bush is a truly lovely gift to give. People may be gone but they will never be forgotten and with this At Peace Rose Gift, they will not only live in your heart but also forever in your garden. At times of darkness or loss giving a gift is never easy. The Rose Remembrance Gift, it is just a simple gesture of respect you have for the situation and the person that has sadly passed. Words can never express feelings at this time, but with these Roses of Remembrance, actions speak louder than words. Choose between the tasteful Creamy White or Light Apricot blooms. Each rose bush will bloom in early Summer and be a loving reminder throughout the summer months. The delicate perfume from the roses will bring a garden to life beautifully. The deep emerald green foliage sets off a beautiful contrast perfectly. * Colour: Either Creamy White or Light Apricot * Type: Hybrid Tea * Scent: Delicate * Final height: Approx 40-60cm * Delivered in a 3.5L pot * Var. At Peace
